title: 如何更改方块nbt
author: zhao4666
txt_content:
按下stone_button后，把stone_button的powered改成false
只要把改powered标签的指令放出来就可以了

replies.author: 破损的鞘翅
replies.txt_content:
按钮不是方块实体，所以只能setblock
execute if block x y z minecraft:stone_button[powered=true] run setblock x y z minecraft:stone_button[powered=false,face=floor,facing=east]

replies.author: tianqi482
replies.txt_content: 大哥，你啥意思？自问自答？
